explains: adj. 预防性的；防止的（等于 preventive）
n. 预防法；预防物（等于 preventive）
wordGroup: preventative maintenance 预防性维修，防护检修

sentences.en: The main preventative agent is simply water.
All information used in the development of national preventative policies would become generally available.
sentences.cn: 制定国家预防政策所使用的所有信息将普遍可用。

sentences.en: As a preventative measure, we are told to let in fresh air by opening the windows and not to use the air conditioners.
sentences.cn: 作为一项预防措施，我们被告知要打开窗户让新鲜空气进来，而不要使用空调。
